3 namespace Ubiquity\contents\validation;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\objects\SessionCache;
7 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\basic\IsBooleanValidator;
8 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\basic\IsEmptyValidator;
9 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\basic\IsFalseValidator;
10 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\basic\IsNullValidator;

14 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\basic\TypeValidator;
15 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\comparison\EqualsValidator;

19 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\comparison\LessThanValidator;

22 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\dates\DateValidator;
23 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\dates\TimeValidator;
24 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\multiples\IdValidator;
25 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\multiples\LengthValidator;
26 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\strings\EmailValidator;
27 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\strings\IpValidator;
28 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\strings\RegexValidator;
29 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\strings\UrlValidator;
30 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
31 
42 class ValidatorsManager extends ValidatorsManagerInitTrait {
43  protected static $instanceValidators = [ ];
44  protected static $cache;
45 
46  public static function start() {
47  self::$cache = new SessionCache ();
48  }
49  public static $validatorTypes = [
50  "notNull" => NotNullValidator::class,
51  "isNull" => IsNullValidator::class,
52  "notEmpty" => NotEmptyValidator::class,
53  "isEmpty" => IsEmptyValidator::class,
54  "isTrue" => IsTrueValidator::class,
55  "isFalse" => IsFalseValidator::class,
56  "isBool" => IsBooleanValidator::class,
57  "equals" => EqualsValidator::class,
58  "type" => TypeValidator::class,
59  "greaterThan" => GreaterThanValidator::class,
60  "greaterThanOrEqual" => GreaterThanOrEqualValidator::class,
61  "lessThan" => LessThanValidator::class,
62  "lessThanOrEqual" => LessThanOrEqualValidator::class,
63  "length" => LengthValidator::class,
64  "id" => IdValidator::class,
65  "regex" => RegexValidator::class,
66  "email" => EmailValidator::class,
67  "url" => UrlValidator::class,
68  "ip" => IpValidator::class,
69  "range" => RangeValidator::class,
70  "date" => DateValidator::class,
71  "dateTime" => DateTimeValidator::class,
72  "time" => TimeValidator::class ];
73  protected static $key = "contents/validators/";
74 
75  protected static function store($model, $validators) {
76  CacheManager::$cache->store ( self::getModelCacheKey ( $model ), $validators );
77  }
78 
79  protected static function fetch($model) {
80  $key = self::getModelCacheKey ( $model );
81  if (CacheManager::$cache->exists ( $key )) {
82  return CacheManager::$cache->fetch ( $key );
83  }
84  return [ ];
85  }
86 
87  public static function getCacheInfo($model) {
88  return self::fetch ( $model );
89  }
90 
91  protected static function getGroupArrayValidators(array $validators, $group) {
92  $result = [ ];
93  foreach ( $validators as $member => $validators ) {
94  $filteredValidators = self::getGroupMemberValidators ( $validators, $group );
95  if (sizeof ( $filteredValidators )) {
96  $result [$member] = $filteredValidators;
97  }
98  }
99  return $result;
100  }
101 
102  protected static function getGroupMemberValidators(array $validators, $group) {
103  $result = [ ];
104  foreach ( $validators as $validator ) {
105  if (isset ( $validator ["group"] ) && $validator ["group"] === $group) {
106  $result [] = $validator;
107  }
108  }
109  return $result;
110  }
111 
112  private static function getCacheValidators($instance, $group = "") {
113  return self::getClassCacheValidators ( get_class ( $instance ), $group );
114  }
115 
116  protected static function getClassCacheValidators($class, $group = "") {
117  if (isset ( self::$cache )) {
118  $key = self::getHash ( $class . $group );
119  if (self::$cache->exists ( $key )) {
120  return self::$cache->fetch ( $key );
121  }
122  }
123  return false;
124  }
125 
133  public static function validate($instance, $group = "") {
134  $class = get_class ( $instance );
135  $cache = self::getClassCacheValidators ( $class, $group );
136  if ($cache !== false) {
137  return self::validateFromCache_ ( $instance, $cache );
138  }
139  $members = self::fetch ( $class );
140  if ($group !== "") {
141  $members = self::getGroupArrayValidators ( $members, $group );
142  }
143  return self::validate_ ( $instance, $members );
144  }
145 
153  public static function validateInstances($instances, $group = "") {
154  if (sizeof ( $instances ) > 0) {
155  $instance = current ( $instances );
156  $class = get_class ( $instance );
157  $cache = self::getClassCacheValidators ( $class, $group );
158  if ($cache === false) {
159  $members = self::fetch ( $class );
160  self::initInstancesValidators ( $instance, $members, $group );
161  $cache = self::$instanceValidators [$class];
162  }
163  return self::validateInstances_ ( $instances, $cache );
164  }
165  return [ ];
166  }
167 
168  public static function clearCache($model = null, $group = "") {
169  if (isset ( self::$cache )) {
170  if (isset ( $model )) {
171  $key = self::getHash ( $model . $group );
172  self::$cache->remove ( $key );
173  } else {
174  self::$cache->clear ();
175  }
176  }
177  }
178 
179  protected static function validateInstances_($instances, $members) {
180  $result = [ ];
181  foreach ( $instances as $instance ) {
182  foreach ( $members as $accessor => $validators ) {
183  foreach ( $validators as $validator ) {
184  $valid = $validator->validate_ ( $instance->$accessor () );
185  if ($valid !== true) {
186  $result [] = $valid;
187  }
188  }
189  }
190  }
191  return $result;
192  }
193 
194  protected static function validate_($instance, $members) {
195  $result = [ ];
196  foreach ( $members as $member => $validators ) {
197  $accessor = "get" . ucfirst ( $member );
198  if (method_exists ( $instance, $accessor )) {
199  foreach ( $validators as $validator ) {
200  $validatorInstance = self::getValidatorInstance ( $validator ["type"] );
201  if ($validatorInstance !== false) {
202  $validatorInstance->setValidationParameters ( $member, $validator ["constraints"], $validator ["severity"]??null, $validator ["message"]??null );
203  $valid = $validatorInstance->validate_ ( $instance->$accessor () );
204  if ($valid !== true) {
205  $result [] = $valid;
206  }
207  }
208  }
209  }
210  }
211  return $result;
212  }
213 
214  protected static function validateFromCache_($instance, $members) {
215  $result = [ ];
216  foreach ( $members as $accessor => $validators ) {
217  foreach ( $validators as $validatorInstance ) {
218  $valid = $validatorInstance->validate_ ( $instance->$accessor () );
219  if ($valid !== true) {
220  $result [] = $valid;
221  }
222  }
223  }
224  return $result;
225  }
226 
233  public static function initCacheInstanceValidators($instance, $group = "") {
234  $class = get_class ( $instance );
235  $members = self::fetch ( $class );
236  self::initInstancesValidators ( $instance, $members, $group );
237  }
238 
239  protected static function initInstancesValidators($instance, $members, $group = "") {
240  $class = get_class ( $instance );
241  $result = [ ];
242  foreach ( $members as $member => $validators ) {
243  $accessor = "get" . ucfirst ( $member );
244  if (method_exists ( $instance, $accessor )) {
245  foreach ( $validators as $validator ) {
246  $validatorInstance = self::getValidatorInstance ( $validator ["type"] );
247  if ($validatorInstance !== false) {
248  $validatorInstance->setValidationParameters ( $member, $validator ["constraints"], $validator ["severity"]??null, $validator ["message"]??null );
249  if ($group === "" || (isset ( $validator ["group"] ) && $validator ["group"] === $group)) {
250  self::$instanceValidators [$class] [$accessor] [] = $validatorInstance;
251  $result [$accessor] [] = $validatorInstance;
252  }
253  }
254  }
255  }
256  }
257  self::$cache->store ( self::getHash ( $class . $group ), $result );
258  }
259 
260  protected static function getHash($class) {
261  return hash ( "sha1", $class );
262  }
263 
264  protected static function getModelCacheKey($classname) {
265  return self::$key . \str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $classname );
266  }
267 
268  protected static function getValidatorInstance($type) {
269  if (isset ( self::$validatorTypes [$type] )) {
270  $class = self::$validatorTypes [$type];
271  return new $class ();
272  } else {
273  Logger::warn ( "validation", "Validator " . $type . " does not exists!" );
274  return false;
275  }
276  }
277 }
